title: Deaf Man Dark Skin Tone
description: Represents a man with dark skin tone who is deaf, often indicated by a hand gesture near the ear. Used to signify deafness, communication without sound, or to represent the deaf community.
apple_vendor_description: The deaf man with dark skin tone emoji on Apple devices is depicted with clear, dignified features and the characteristic glossy finish of Apple's rendering. His hands are shown in a distinct sign language gesture, rendered with precise detail and realistic lighting. This emoji on Apple devices is a vital representation of the deaf community and the beauty of sign language, promoting inclusivity and awareness.
